note.p: Birth: Umstadt, near Darmstadt, Germany (14 or 15 April 1833)

Career: Assistant to Bunsen; went to England with Sir Henry Roscoe (FRS 1863); Assistant to Lyon Playfair (FRS 1848), Edinburgh; Assistant to Alexander Crum Brown (FRS 1879), Edinburgh; Professor of Chemistry,
Notes: DSB gives birth date of 15 April 1833. Index to BR gives 10 Mar, probable source being Pogg.
